name: Takato Matsuki
effect: [Your Turn] When an opponent's Digimon is deleted, you may suspend this Tamer to gain 1 memory.[Your Turn] When one of your Digimon would digivolve into a Digimon with [Gallantmon] or [Growlmon] in its name, that Digimon gains "[When Digivolving] ＜Blitz＞ (This Digimon can attack when your opponent has 1 or more memory.)" for the turn.
security_effect: [Security] Play this card without paying its memory cost.
